name: Morse Code Transmission Tester
description:
Morse Code Transmission Tester is a game where you are given words and have to transcribe them into morse code.  You use the space bar with a short tap for a "dot", and a long tap for a "dash".  
MCTT was made during my fifth semester in college for my "Game-A-Week" class.  In this class we are given a theme at the end of class and we have one week to each make our own full games.  The theme given to us this week was "One-Button Game".  
Initially I made this game for a computer and using the space-bar, but a few weeks later decided to convert it to a mobile device.  This game was made with Unity3D in C#.
